org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.interceptor

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.interceptor.Event
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArtifactEvent, MessageEvent, ServerEvent

    public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all the events created by any of the interception
    Since:
    2.0.0

      protected InterceptionContext context
      The event context of the interception

      Event(java.lang.String subject, InterceptionContext context)
